name: boilerplate
description: Boilerplate with postcss, bower, babel, rollup, document-register-element, normalize.css and npm scripts for building, watching and reloading

scripts.start: npm run watch:js & npm run watch:css & npm run serve
scripts.preserve: npm run build:js & npm run build:css
scripts.serve: browser-sync start --server www --server dist --server bower_components --files 'dist/*, www/*'
scripts.build:js: mkdir -p dist && rollup js/script.js | babel -m umd --module-id myElement -o dist/script.js
scripts.build:css: postcss -u autoprefixer --autoprefixer.browsers 'last 2 versions' -u postcss-import -o dist/style.css css/index.css

author: Victor Nystad
